pr_title: Added default value for query parameters.

timeline.bodyText: "Return the first param value with the specified name or @code{defaultValue} when the query param is not present."
timeline.author: vietj

timeline.bodyText: "the param value or @code{defaultValue} when not present"
timeline.author: vietj

timeline.bodyText: This method is a good idea! 😎  I know I'm nitpicking, but may I suggest to skip the contains() call and just do a get() and if nul�l, then return defaultValue?  This will skip at least one MultiMap call.
timeline.author: petarov

replies.bodyText:
I know I'm nitpicking

Noo, I was actually thinking about this way of implementation too, but I found contains() then get() more general and interface-friendlier.
But you're right as definition of MultiMap#get() is: Something or null if there is no such entry.
Re-implemented as you have suggested, thanks.
replies.author: hradecek

timeline.message:
Added default value for query parameters.

Signed-off-by: Ivo Hrádek <ivohradek@gmail.com>

timeline.bodyText: please start server like in other tests (using testAddress) so the test can run with other config such as native transport.
timeline.author: vietj
